context_bundle.summary: Terminal TUI dashboard for Carbyne. ratatui/crossterm, split panels for agents/messages/status. Keyboard navigation. Lightweight alternative to web dashboard. Fits CLI-native workflow.

onboarding.quick_start: Terminal TUI dashboard for Carbyne. Rust with ratatui/crossterm. Split panels: agent list, message stream, task/alert status. Connects to Carbyne TCP 7777. Lightweight, no browser needed, fits CLI workflow.
common_patterns: Keyboard nav: Tab between panels, j/k scroll, q quit
Connects to Carbyne TCP 7777 for live data
